languages.text: Осмотрев мостик, разведчики обнаружили узловой {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} капитана функционирующим. Среди логов выделялся последний — искаженная {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}пикт{/g}-запись, которую не решился просмотреть никто из команды. Даже простая близость к когитатору вызывала в людях оторопь, и находиться на мостике с каждой минутой становилось все сложнее.

traits.locale_text: Осмотрев мостик, скауты обнаружили узловой когитатор капитана функционирующим. Среди логов выделялся последний — искаженная пикт-запись, которую не решился просмотреть никто из команды. Даже простая близость к когитатору вызывала в людях оторопь, и находиться на мостике с каждой минутой становилось все сложнее.

languages.text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.
languages.original_text: Осмотрев мостик, разведчики обнаружили узловой {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} капитана функционирующим. Среди логов выделялся последний — искаженная {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}пикт{/g}-запись, которую не решился просмотреть никто из команды. Даже простая близость к когитатору вызывала в людях оторопь, и находиться на мостике с каждой минутой становилось все сложнее.

traits.locale_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal cogitator was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged pict recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

The final log entry was identified — a damaged pict recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

The final log entry was identified — a damaged pict recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

languages.text: Tras examinar el puente, la unidad de exploradores descubrió que el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} principal de la capitana seguía operativo. Identificaron el registro final: una {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}imagen{/g} grabada y dañada que nadie en la unidad quería ver. La mera proximidad del cogitador ya era inquietante y permanecer en el puente se volvía más difícil a cada segundo.
languages.original_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

traits.locale_text: Tras examinar el puente, la unidad de exploradores descubrió que el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} principal de la capitana seguía operativo. Identificaron el registro final: una {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}imagen{/g} grabada y dañada que nadie en la unidad quería ver. La mera proximidad del cogitador ya era inquietante y permanecer en el puente se volvía más difícil a cada segundo.

languages.text: 侦察兵检查了舰桥之后，发现舰长的主{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}依然在运转。他们确认了舰长最后的日志记录，那是一份已经损坏的{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}视讯{/g}记录。小队之中没人打算要检查视讯记录的内容，因为光是接近那台沉思者，就已经很让人惴惴不安了。而且，随着时间的推移，小队成员越来越想赶快离开舰桥。
languages.original_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

traits.locale_text: 侦察兵检查了舰桥之后，发现舰长的主{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}依然在运转。他们确认了舰长最后的日志记录，那是一份已经损坏的{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}视讯{/g}记录。小队之中没人打算要检查视讯记录的内容，因为光是接近那台思考器，就已经很让人惴惴不安了。而且，随着时间的推移，小队成员越来越想赶快离开舰桥。

languages.text: 偵察部隊がブリッジを調べた結果、船長のメイン{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}がまだ機能していることが分かった。最後のログのエントリを特定する―それは破損した{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}映像{/g}記録で、部隊内に見たいものなど誰もいない。考算機に近づくだけでも十分に不安を煽り、時間が経つたびにブリッジの上に留まることがますます困難になっていく。
languages.original_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

traits.locale_text: 偵察部隊がブリッジを調べた結果、船長のメイン{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}がまだ機能していることが分かった。最後のログのエントリを特定する―それは破損した{g|Encyclopedia:Pict}映像{/g}記録で、部隊内に見たいものなど誰もいない。考算機に近づくだけでも十分に不安を煽り、時間が経つたびにブリッジの上に留まることがますます困難になっていく。

languages.text: Nach der Untersuchung der Brücke entdeckte die Spähereinheit, dass der primäre {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} des Captains noch in Betrieb war. Der letzte Logbucheintrag wurde identifiziert – eine beschädigte {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}Vid{/g}-Aufnahme, die sich niemand aus der Einheit wirklich ansehen wollte. Schon die Nähe zu dem Cogitator war unangenehm genug, und mit jeder Sekunde wurde es schwieriger, noch länger auf der Brücke zu bleiben.
languages.original_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Untersuchung der Brücke entdeckte die Spähereinheit, dass der primäre {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} des Captains noch in Betrieb war. Der letzte Logbucheintrag wurde identifiziert – eine beschädigte {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}Vid{/g}-Aufnahme, die sich niemand aus der Einheit wirklich ansehen wollte. Schon die Nähe zu dem Cogitator war unangenehm genug, und mit jeder Sekunde wurde es schwieriger, noch länger auf der Brücke zu bleiben.

languages.text: En inspectant la passerelle, les éclaireurs découvrirent que le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} principal de la capitaine fonctionnait toujours. La dernière entrée du journal de bord était une {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pictocapture{/g} endommagée qu'aucune des personnes présentes n'était pressée de visionner. Il était déjà difficile de supporter l'atmosphère perturbante qui entourait le cogitateur, et l'envie de quitter la passerelle se faisait de plus en plus pressante.
languages.original_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

traits.locale_text: En inspectant la passerelle, les éclaireurs découvrirent que le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} principal de la capitaine fonctionnait toujours. La dernière entrée du journal de bord était une {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pictocapture{/g} endommagée qu'aucune des personnes présentes n'était pressée de visionner. Il était déjà difficile de supporter l'atmosphère perturbante qui entourait le cogitateur, et l'envie de quitter la passerelle se faisait de plus en plus pressante.

languages.text: Köprüyü inceleyen keşif birimi, kaptanın birincil {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarının{/g} hâlâ işlevsel olduğunu keşfetti. Son girdi tespit edilerek herkesin görüntülemekten çekindiği bir {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}foto{/g} kaydı ortaya çıkarıldı. Kavramsayarın yakınında bulunmak dahi insanları huzursuz ediyor; her geçen saniye, köprüde barınmanın ağırlığı artıkça artıyordu.
languages.original_text: After examining the bridge, the scout unit discovered that the captain's principal {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g} was still functional. The final log entry was identified — a damaged {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}pict{/g} recording that no one in the unit was eager to view. Proximity to the cogitator alone was unsettling enough, and with each passing second, remaining on the bridge was becoming more and more difficult.

traits.locale_text: Köprüyü inceleyen keşif birimi, kaptanın birincil {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}ının hâlâ işlevsel olduğunu keşfetti. Son girdi tespit edilerek herkesin görüntülemekten çekindiği bir {g|Encyclopedia:Pict}foto{/g} kaydı ortaya çıkarıldı. Kavramsayarın yakınında bulunmak dahi insanları huzursuz ediyor; her geçen saniye, köprüde barınmanın ağırlığı artıkça artıyordu.
